entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
